citations.title: Generative AI and Large Language Models in Language Preservation
Indigenous Protocol and Artificial Intelligence Position Paper
CARE Principles for Indigenous Data Governance (GIDA)
The First Nations Principles of OCAP (FNIGC brochure)
Papa Reo: “Whisper is another case study in Colonisation”
WIRED: “Māori are trying to save their language from Big Tech”
Findings of the AmericasNLP 2023 Shared Task on Machine Translation
Indigenous data sovereignty in intangible cultural heritage governance (International Journal of Cultural Property)
